summary: OIL LEAKS! IST OIL LEAK GREENISH FLUID LEAKING FROM UNDER ENGINE SKID PLATE. HAD THAT REPAIRED AT BILLINGS CHEVROLET, AND IT IS STILL LEAKING. TECHNICIAN SAID AXLE SEAL WAS LEAKING. 2ND LEAK, ENGINE OIL LEAKING ONTO EXHAUST PIPE WHICH IS GIVING OFF BURNING SMELL IN CABIN. REPAIRED ONCE, AND IT IS STILL LEAKING. SERVICE WAS DONE AT ANDERSON CHEVROLET, MENLO CA. ****DIMS 11 IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****761300. *AK *JB
